Package net.royalur.notation

Class JsonNotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.notation.Notation
      • net.royalur.notation.JsonNotation
  • public class JsonNotation
extends Notation
    A notation that can be used to encode games of the Royal Game of Ur into JSON for serialisation. This notation has been created to be read by machines, not humans.

    • Field Summary

        public static final int LATEST_VERSION
        The latest version of the JSON notation. If any breaking changes are made to the JSON notation, then this field will be updated to reflect that.

                                                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the state of a player to the JSON generator.
        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of pieces in the game.
        S - The type of player state stored in the game.
        R - The type of roll made in the game.
        Parameters:
        playerState - The state of the player to write.
        rules - The rules of the game.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing the JSON.

      • encodeGame

        @Nonnull
public <P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll> java.lang.String encodeGame​(@Nonnull
                                                                                                      Game<P,​S,​R> game)
        Description copied from class: Notation
        Encodes the given game, game, into text.
        Specified by:
        encodeGame in class Notation
        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board.
        S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
        R - The type of rolls that may be made.
        Parameters:
        game - The game to be encoded.
        Returns:
        Text that represents game in this notation.

      • decodeGame

        @Nonnull
public <P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll> Game<P,​S,​R> decodeGame​(@Nonnull
                                                                                                             RuleSet<P,​S,​R> rules,
                                                                                                             @Nonnull
                                                                                                             java.lang.String encoded)
        Description copied from class: Notation
        Decodes the game from the text encoded, based upon the rules rules.
        Specified by:
        decodeGame in class Notation
        Type Parameters:
        P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board.
        S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
        R - The type of rolls that may be made.
        Parameters:
        rules - The rules used to simulate the game as it is decoded.
        encoded - The text to decode into a game.
        Returns:
        The decoded game.
